label: 七分法
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: Artificial standards for tax remission claims based on crop damage.  Only one-seventh of damaged public land was to be deemed upper grade, and assessments of middle, lower, and lowest were to be ascribed, regardless of actual fact, in equal amounts to the remaining six-sevenths (p. 298).
